name: set_energy_plus_light_objects_lpd
display_name: Set Energy Plus Light Objects LPD
modeler_description_xml: Affected lights objects will have "Design Level Calculation Method" set to "Watts/Area" and the "Watts per Zone Floor Area" set to the requested SI value.
description_xml: Set the LPD for all lights objects in the model. Input values are in SI units.
